channel.title: CVE Feed for B&R -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for B&R -- all products

item.title: CVE-2020-11646|2024-08-04T11:35:13.460Z -- b%26r -- gatemanager
item.description: A log information disclosure vulnerability in B&R GateManager 4260 and 9250 versions <9.0.20262 and GateManager 8250 versions <9.2.620236042 allows authenticated users to view log information reserved for other users.

item.title: CVE-2020-11643|2024-08-04T11:35:13.611Z -- b%26r -- gatemanager
item.description: An information disclosure vulnerability in B&R GateManager 4260 and 9250 versions <9.0.20262 and GateManager 8250 versions <9.2.620236042 allows authenticated users to view information of devices belonging to foreign domains.

item.title: CVE-2020-11644|2024-08-04T11:35:13.604Z -- b%26r -- gatemanager
item.description: The information disclosure vulnerability present in B&R GateManager 4260 and 9250 versions <9.0.20262 and GateManager 8250 versions <9.2.620236042 allows authenticated users to generate fake audit log messages.

item.title: CVE-2020-11645|2024-08-04T11:35:13.674Z -- b%26r -- gatemanager
item.description: A denial of service vulnerability in B&R GateManager 4260 and 9250 versions <9.0.20262 and GateManager 8250 versions <9.2.620236042 allows authenticated users to limit availability of GateManager instances.

item.title: CVE-2020-11641|2024-08-04T11:35:13.849Z -- b%26r -- sitemanager
item.description: A local file inclusion vulnerability in B&R SiteManager versions <9.2.620236042 allows authenticated users to read sensitive files from SiteManager instances.

item.title: CVE-2020-11637|2024-08-04T11:35:13.385Z -- b%26r -- automation%20runtime
item.description: A memory leak in the TFTP service in B&R Automation Runtime versions <N4.26, <N4.34, <F4.45, <E4.53, <D4.63, <A4.73 and prior could allow an unauthenticated attacker with network access to cause a denial of service (DoS) condition.

item.title: CVE-2020-11642|2024-08-04T11:35:13.388Z -- b%26r -- sitemanager
item.description: The local file inclusion vulnerability present in B&R SiteManager versions <9.2.620236042 allows authenticated users to impact availability of SiteManager instances.
